did.head: Overview of the Collection

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Connecticut. General Assembly. Joint Standing Committee on Education

did.abstract: Subjects covered include adult literacy, bilingual education, higher education, school construction, school integration, school equalization, special education, teacher and school administrator shortage.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Subjects covered include adult literacy, bilingual education, higher education, school construction, school integration, school equalization, special education, teacher and school administrator shortage. Records include meeting material, background material and legislative material.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: These records are stored at an off-site facility and therefore may not be available on a same-day basis.
